Sentencas: Spherical La(0.8)Sr(0.2)Ga(0.8)Mg(0.2)O(2.8) precursor powders were synthesized by ultrasonic spray pyrolysis using aqueous solution of citric acid and of metal nitrate.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: As-prepared powders obtained by this method have a spherical morphology with a submicron size.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The calcination behavior of the precursor powders of the above phases were examined in the temperature range of 1073 -1773
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis
Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: XRD, SEM, DTA-TG and BET analysis were used for determination of the composition, morphology, particle size and surface area.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: XRD revealed that as-prepared powders were crystallized to perovskite structure after the sintering at 1573 K for 10 h.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La1-XSrX)(Ga1-YMgY)O3 particles by spray pyrolysis
